name: 艾丽西亚·洛博
name_full: 艾丽西亚·洛博 Alicia Lobo
introduction: Alicia was born and raised in Madrid, Spain. She is an only child. Her father is one of Spain's most important neurologists and her mother is a psychologist. She attended Hastings School and therefore had a British education. Then, she graduated simultaneously in Drama (William Layton Theatre Laboratory) and in Publicity and Public Relations (Universidad Complutense of Madrid). After, she was granted a Fulbright Scholarship in Performing Arts in New York, where she lived for over two years. Actress, MC and voice over talent, she works mostly in English and Spanish and also speaks French and Italian.
